channel.title: [PI] Command+time
channel.description: I don't want any of you guys uselessly posting being like. "Oh well idk" you guys need stop spaming. Anyways basicly what im asking for is if anyone knows how to make a command that has a time limit like can only use every 10 mins.

item.description:

[quote=“Shadowspkin, post:9, topic:370804”]Can’t its just like this thow

}
^
l

My awesome arrow rofl.[/quote]

oh shit,

im sorry lol i just wrote this code kinda fast

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“active”)) {
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastcommand > 600000) { //#### = number of milliseconds you must wait before using the command again
c.lastcommand = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.sendMessage(“You receive 10 pc points!”);
c.pcpoints += 10; //you would have to change this to whatever your pcpoints token is
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You can only receive pc points once every 10 minutes!”);

                        }

}[/code]

whoops left a } out at the end

that should work, sorry lol

Read full topic

if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastcommand > 600000) { //#### = number of milliseconds you must wait before using the command again
c.lastcommand = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.sendMessage(“You receive 10 pc points!”);
c.pcpoints += 10; //you would have to change this to whatever your pcpoints token is
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You can only receive pc points once every 10 minutes!”);

                	}[/code]

item.title: [PI] Command+time
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Shadowspkin:

One last thing :D, You know how much millisec’s are in 10 mins rofl…

rofl

1000 milliseconds = 1 second
60 seconds = 1 minute
60000 milliseconds = 60 seconds
60000 milliseconds = 1 minute
60000 * 10 = 600000

so 600000 = 10 minutes

isnt math fun?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Command+time
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Shadowspkin:

Could you make this like so it would give pc points or no?

if (playerCommand.startsWith("command")) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastcommand > #####) { //#### = number of milliseconds you must wait before using the command again c.lastcommand = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.sendMessage("You receive 10 pc points!"); c.pcpoints += 10; //you would have to change this to whatever your pcpoints token is } else { c.sendMessage("You can only receive pc points once every 10 minutes!"); }

item.title: [PI] Command+time
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“command”)) {
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastcommand > #####) { //#### = number of milliseconds you must wait before using the command again
c.lastcommand = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.sendMessage(“You have used this command!”);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You can only use this command every 10 minutes!”);
}

[/code]

Also in player.java

add this to public long lastPlayerMove

, lastcommand,

Hope this helps
